CustomField.formula:
CASE(MainLOAStatus__c,
"Awaiting Policy Numbers","First_Five_Stages_Email_Description__c",
"Awaiting Provider Policy Numbers","First_Five_Stages_Email_Description__",
"Send to Provider","First_Five_Stages_Email_Description__",
"Sent to provider","First_Five_Stages_Email_Description__",
"LOA Rejected Internal","First_Five_Stages_Email_Description__",
"LOA Rejected Action Required from Client","Client_Actions_email_description__c",
"Outside SLA","Second_Email_Descriptions__c",
"LOA Received Awaiting Information","Second_Email_Descriptions__c",
"LOA Accepted Awaiting Information","Third_Email_Descriptions__c",
"Information Received","Third_Email_Descriptions__c",
"Information rerequested","Third_Email_Descriptions__c",
"Specialist reviewed","Third_Email_Descriptions__c",
"LOA Analysis","Third_Email_Descriptions__c",
"Completed","Third_Email_Descriptions__c", "ERROR" )
CustomField.label: Main Email Description
